title: Two Views from the Eight Views of the Xiao and Xiang Rivers
artistDisplayBio: Japanese, active second half of 15th century
medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink and color on paper
dimensions:
Image (a): 18 1/16 × 11 3/4 in. (45.8 × 29.9 cm)
Overall with mounting (a): 51 15/16 × 16 3/8 in. (132 × 41.6 cm)
Overall with knobs (a): 51 15/16 × 18 1/8 in. (132 × 46 cm)
Image (b): 18 1/8 × 11 3/4 in. (46 × 29.9 cm)
Overall with mounting (b): 52 1/16 × 16 5/16 in. (132.2 × 41.5 cm)
Overall with knobs (b): 52 1/16 × 18 1/8 in. (132.2 × 46 cm)
creditLine: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation, 2015
repository: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY
